path.description: The folder where the file(s) will be uploaded to (only supported on strapi-provider-upload-aws-s3).

refId.description: The ID of the entry which the file(s) will be linked to

ref.description: The unique ID (uid) of the model which the file(s) will be linked to (api::restaurant.restaurant).

field.description: The field of the entry which the file(s) will be precisely linked to.
